Queena Grot makes one-of-a-kind lamps. It is a labour of love by Pamela Rosel, a Filipina Australian artist and self-taught ceramicist interested in light and intimacy. She lives and works in Meanjin, Australia.

For enquiries:
queenagrot@gmail.com
@queena_grot (instagram)

I would like to acknowledge the Turrbal and Jagera people and their land on which I live and create. I pay my respects to their ongoing spiritual connection to the land, waters and culture, to their Elders past, present and emerging.

Exhibition: SHOWCASE by New Assemblage

Ode to Heidelberg
glazed ceramic lamp & flower holder
40 x 29 x 23 cm
E27 bulb
AU socket

122 Gertrude Street, Fitzroy VIC @new.assemblage

Photo by Annika Kafcaloudis
Styling by Ella Saddington & Henry King
